document_name: National disaster risk management strategy and Action plan
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CIV/2011/CIV-2011-01-10-National disaster risk management strategy and Action plan_7e0f831f069ded9da10027d147a31336.pdf
document_description: The National Disaster Risk Management Strategy and Plan of Action aims to strengthen national capacities in disaster risk management. It presents a general overview of the country (climate and geography), the institutional framework, the National Strategy which focuses on 4 lines of action (public sector engagement, risk assessment, awareness and capacity building) and the Action Plan.
